data.thought: S42|H|S40|Hybrid Phenotype H2: 'Live Coding Performance Platform'. Combines: Creative (G1-G3) + Observatory (E3 collab) + Reactive (B3 playground). Multiple performers, each w/ notebook. Code â†’ audio/visual in real-time. Observatory: unified stage view. Audience sees: code being written + output generated. Performers react to each other. Container: isolated audio/visual rendering per performer. Emergent: collaborative improvisation w/ code as instrument. Use case: algoraves, creative coding events, art installations.
